1483770.name: Primal Man Simulator
1483770.description:
It’s Pleistocene and the human life is still quite uncomplicated. Trying to live through the day and not get eaten by wild animals is the agenda for the most people. But you are different. You are one of the first who ten to combine and create by the means of experimentation. And you may be the one of those who will remain.

Primal Man Simulator is and ultra-realistic survival simulator focused on crafting and improvisation. The game throws you into the wilderness without any explanation and it’s up to your curiosity and evolutionary dexterity make it to another day. Teach yourself how to start a fire, cook and create simple tools that will help you in your trials and tribulations.

Explore vast forest filled with secrets to discover. Hunt for food, fight for survival, gather resources and search for drinking water. Remember – in the wilderness everything is your enemy. Inspect your body thoroughly for any scratches, bruises or rashes. Find natural medications and take care of your wounds. Survive so one of your descendants may become a homo sapiens.

Main features:

- Ultra-realistic survival game with no tutorials whatsoever.
- Large amount of overlapping game mechanics that make the forest feel alive.
- Encouragement of crafting and experimentation.
- Hundreds of hours of gameplay and there’s still more to discover.
1483770.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
